General.Name: Halla Holdings Corp
General.Description: HL Holdings Corporation engages in the automobile, construction, and education/sports businesses in South Korea and internationally. The company offers automobile parts. It also operates a port terminal; a university; an ice hockey club; and a golf club. The company was formerly known as Halla Holdings Corp. and changed its name to HL Holdings Corporation in October 2022. HL Holdings Corporation was founded in 1962 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
